edu.ncsu.csc216.train_travel.manager

Interface TicketMaster

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReservationManager

    public interface TicketMaster
    TicketMaster describes the behaviors needed to manage reservations for a train.
    Author:
    Jo Perry

    • Method Detail

      • makeNewReservation

        Reservation makeNewReservation(int numPassengers,
                               java.lang.String kind)
        Create a new reservation.
        Parameters:
        numPassengers - number of passengers on the new reservation
        kind - determines which kind of reservation to create
        Returns:
        the newly created reservation

      • cancelReservation

        void cancelReservation(java.lang.String reservationString)
        Cancel a reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationString - determines which reservation to cancel

      • changeSeats

        void changeSeats(java.lang.String reservationString,
                 java.lang.String newSeats)
        Change seats for a reservation.
        Parameters:
        reservationString - determines which reservation to change
        newSeats - a string representation of the new seats to assign to the reservation

      • printReservationList

        java.lang.String printReservationList()
        Show the list of current reservations as a string.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the reservation list

      • showMap

        java.lang.String showMap(int idx)
        Show a seating map for a train car.
        Parameters:
        idx - index for which train map to show
        Returns:
        a string representation of the train car map.

      • numberOfSeatMaps

        int numberOfSeatMaps()
        How many seat maps are there?
        Returns:
        the number of seat maps
